TEXT.TITLE: ACCUGRAPH IN ASIA MARKETING PACT WITH TRIO-TECH
TEXT.BODY: <Accugraph Corp> said it named Trio-Tech International Pte Ltd, of Singapore, as exclusive distributor of Accugraph's computer-aided design and manufacturing software for Singapore, the Philippines, Thailand, Malaysia, Indonesia and Brunei. Financial terms were undisclosed. Reuter
